messages.body: $AAPL Bank of America Merrill Lynch expects a foldable iPhone to hit the market in a couple of years. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-analyst-apple-inc-aapl-foldable-iphone-coming-in-2020/

links.title: Analyst: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Foldable iPhone Coming In 2020
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is gearing up to launch a few new phones this fall, but the really major upgrades won't come for another couple of years. That's according to Bank of America Merrill Lynch, who published a bullish note about AAPL to clients this week, suggesting a revolutionary new iPhone design would launch in 2020.

links.description: The markets sure moves fast these days, the S&P 500 was down by nearly 6 percent this week! $1.1 trillion in market cap wiped off the S&P 500 over the past two days, and $1.5 trillion for the week! So you think the trade wars totals will amount that much?
